mapper.insert: insert into members (userId, userName, userPwd, userEmail, userPhone, userRole) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, md5(#{userPwd}), #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userRole})
mapper.select: select userId, userName, userRole from members where userId = #{userId} and userPwd = md5(#{userPwd})
select userId, userName, userEmail, userPhone, userRole, userDel from members order by userRole
mapper.delete: update members set userDel = 1 where userId = #{userId}
